div.p: The posture of the subject (for example, during a clinical measurement). This value set is not exhaustive.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
33586001sitting
102538003lying down
10904000standing
272580008semi-recumbent

description.value: The posture of the subject (for example, during a clinical measurement). This value set is not exhaustive.
